entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
